snippet: Almost two years ago, Prescott residents were mourning 19 firefighters. Now the town has lost a young woman killed while being held hostage by ISIS.
abstract: Prescott, Ariz, town that grieved over 19 firefighters killed in June 2013 as they fought wildfire, once again mourns its own as resident Kayla Mueller is confirmed dead after being held hostage in Syria by Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: Almost two years ago, Prescott residents were mourning 19 firefighters. Now the town has lost a young woman killed while being held hostage by ISIS.

headline.seo: Prescott, Ariz., Mourns Kayla Mueller, Not 2 Years After 19 Firefighters Died
headline.main: Hostage’s Hometown Is Well Acquainted With Loss
headline.print_headline: Hostage’s Hometown Is Well Acquainted With Loss

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
